Roy Blumenthal (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1968 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ ode abụ kemgbe mmalite afọ 1990
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ebe mbipụta bu Barefoot Press, nke malitere ibipụta akwụkwọ mpịakọta n'efu
E bipụtara mbipụta ise, na mbipụta nke puku iri abụo nke ọ bụla.
Roy Blumenthal so Graeme Friedman, A Writer in Stone, dezie ụtụ nye onye edemede South Africa, Lionel Abrahams.
Blumenthal bụkwa onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na-edekọ akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye n'eme ihe nkiri, na onye na-ese ihe nkiri.

Onye bụ onye onyinye otu oge na MoneywebLIFE, Blumenthal bụ onye na-akọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị nke na-eji ngwakọta nke anya, ederede, na ndị na-agbakọta iji mee nkwupụta siri ike na nke siri doro anya banyere ọnọdụ akụ na ụba nke South Africa.
Blumenthal na-ebi ndụ ya dị ka onye na-ahụ anya (aka, sketchnoter, ma ọ bụ onye na-ewe ihe osise), na-agbanwe ihe ọ na-anụ na nzukọ, ọrụ, na ụlọ ọrụ ka ọ bụrụ foto.
